column1:
Healthcare Experience Survey
1. How would you rate your overall satisfaction with the healthcare services you have received? (Very Satisfied, Satisfied, Neutral, Dissatisfied, Very Dissatisfied)
2. What specific healthcare services have you used in the past year? (Select all that apply: Primary Care, Specialist Care, Emergency Services, Mental Health Services, Preventive Care)
3. Please describe any challenges you faced while accessing healthcare services. (Open-ended)
4. How often do you visit your healthcare provider? (Once a month, Every few months, Once a year, Rarely, Never)
5. In your opinion, what improvements could be made to enhance the quality of healthcare services? (Open-ended)
6. How do you prefer to receive health information? (Multiple choice: In-person, Online, Printed materials, Other)
7. Would you recommend your healthcare provider to others? (Yes, No, Maybe)
